a drag.translation[0].definitions[0].def: something or someone that is boring
a drag.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Don’t be such a drag! Come to the party.
a drag.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is annoying and continues for a long time
a drag.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: It’s a real drag having to travel so far to work every day.
